items.title: Judge orders Trump officials to testify about efforts to return wrongly deported man
items.description: A U.S. judge on Tuesday demanded U.S. officials provide documents and answer questions under oath about what it had done to secure the return of a man...

items.title: AOC fundraising soars as the New York rep and Bernie Sanders barnstorm U.S. against Trump
items.description: Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez has become a leading face of the Democratic Party's resistance to the Trump administration, drawing crowds nationwide.

items.title: 20,000 IRS employees interested in deferred resignation offer as tax deadline looms
items.description: The Trump administration has offered buyouts across the government in a bid to dramatically shrink the size of the federal workforce.

items.title: Trump 'looking into' legality of deporting U.S. citizens to foreign prisons, White House says
items.description: The Trump administration has already deported hundreds of alleged members of a Venezuelan gang from the U.S. to El Salvador, where they are in prison.

items.title: DOJ fires longtime spokesman who worked on Trump investigations
items.description: Robert Mueller and Jack Smith investigated Trump for the DOJ on questions of obstruction of justice, election interference and retention of classified...
